body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth          Earn a Junior Ranger Badge with the Anza Trail  Commander Anza is recruiting people to go to Alta California! Are you ready to make the trip? Visit our online Junior Ranger program at http://www.AnzaHistoricTrail.org/JuniorRangers.   See if you can make the right decisions to reach Alta California as a member of the Anza Expedition and we will send you an official Anza Trail Junior Ranger badge!
title: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail: Kids & Youth
